feature.label: Log4J Viewer
feature.description: This feature provides a set of eclipse plugins (backend and frontend) to capture log events generated by [apache's log4j 2.x](https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/index.html) logging facilities and written to a [SocketAppender](https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/manual/appenders/network.html#SocketAppender).
